reuters.title: HONGKONG BANK SAYS CLOSE TO DEAL ON PROPERTY SALE
reuters.body: Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corp <HKBH.HK> is close to a deal on the sale of a commercial building in Hong Kong's Mongkok business district, a bank spokesman said. He said the 21-storey Wayfoong Plaza was likely to be sold for about 280 mln H.K. Dlrs but declined to identify the buyer. The spokesman gave no further details. REUTER 
